Hi! I am a labor economist. My research interests are in answering microeconomic questions on economic inequality in **Labor and Public Economics**. Depending on the question, I use either design-based, or model-based methods, or both. I received my PhD in Economics, from the [University of Wisconsin-Madison](https://econ.wisc.edu/). Starting Fall 2024, I will join [Clark University](https://www.clarku.edu/departments/economics/), as an Assistant Professor of Economics.
